documentation.content: Alerts when usage reaches 80% for 1 minute. [View quotas](https://console.cloud.google.com/iam-admin/quotas

conditionMonitoringQueryLanguage.query: fetch ${MONITORED_RESOURCE}| filter resource.service == '${SERVICE_NAME}' && resource.project_id == '${PROJECT_ID}'| { metric ${METRIC_USAGE_TYPE}| align delta_gauge(1m)| group_by [metric.quota_metric, resource.location], sum(value.net_usage); metric ${METRIC_LIMIT_TYPE}| filter ${QUOTA_FILTER} | group_by [metric.quota_metric, resource.location],sliding(1m), min(val()) }| ratio| every 1m| condition gt(val(), 0.8 '1')
